DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect on LH levels of the 5-day CC administration during luteal phase in oocyte donors, to investigate whether the CC corrects the suppressed LH levels in the luteal phase and whether it prolongs the luteal phase in the agonist triggered antagonist cycles.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Clomiphene Citrate Administration During the Early Luteal Phase on Endocrine Profile in IVF Cycles
DOC.criteria: Oocyte donors 1835 years old BMI 1829 Kg/m2 Normal basal hormonal levels No contraceptive pill Polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS) Previous participation in the study
